item.title: JERSEY DINING TABLE CERAMIC
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 25TH OCTOBER

Jersey, Art is conventionally placed in frames. Rarely, frames become art. Featured here is a piece of curved frames and planes in brushed brass, intersecting to support an expanse of smoky walnut with white ceramic top . Now ready to be acquired.

item.title: GAYLA BEDROOM SET
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 4TH AUGUST

Style doesn't make a fuss. It simply waits for you to get it. Gayla plays it well. What meets the eye, is lines of brass buffed to a dazzle. What doesn’t, is the resilience of poplar and pine. Or the artful way in which the Antonio Porcelain smart fabric shrugs everything off with elegant nonchalance.

item.title: WESLEY DINING CHAIR
item.description: The Welsley chairs are designed keeping contemporary aesthetics in mind. Featuring a circular wooden cutout as backrest, and high-quality cushion for utmost comfort, this chair is sure to get your interested.

item.title: WESLEY DINING TABLE
item.description: Like crossing orbits in an imaginary solar system, Wesley's intriguingly overlapped gimbal circles bring together the worlds of design and culinary art for an exquisite new experience. Topped with glass or onyx marble, this is a statement piece that's light on the eye.

item.title: TRAPEZOID SIDEBOARD
item.description: This contemporary sideboard adds modernity to your home. With an espresso covering and a lux titanium finish, it effortlessly brings grace and utility along with it.

item.title: TRAPEZOID DINING TABLE
item.description: Trapezoid. As the name suggests, the luxe titanium finished legs define the look. The elongated trapezoid is a throwback to the transition between mid-century and jet age, and part of the contemporary renaissance. Curiously, it's the subtle smoke oak veneer top tabletop that plays a supporting role.

item.title: TERRENCE DINING CHAIR
item.description: A short-sized chair with a sleek, wooden back is out attempt at contemporizing your décor. The thick, comfortable cushion sits atop four simply shaped wooden legs.

item.title: TEDDY DINING CHAIR
item.description: The Teddy collection is the epitome of comfort. The key highlight is the back extends to create a comfortable armrest. The thick fabric gives the chair a classy look.

item.title: SHAYLA SIDE BOARD
item.description: This storage piece pairs function with fashion, and beautifully blends with your other ensemble. Crafted from high-quality wood with walnut veneer covering and brass brushed finish, it makes for e perfect addition to your living space.

item.title: SAVINA DININGTABLE
item.description: First, the base. Like the swirl of a Flamenco dancer's skirt, is this intriguing lineup of hand contoured wood strips, built piece by painstaking piece on to a brass platform. The top is a slice of subtly grained marble. All in all Savina turns dining into a performance art.
